plugins.name: Ting-Image
plugins.description:
Ting Image—One-click compression, instant format conversion. Switch between PNG, JPEG, WEBP, AVIF for smaller, optimized images. Efficiency meets ease!

1. Efficient Compression

Advanced algorithms reduce image size while preserving quality, saving storage and speeding up load times.

2. Multi-Format Conversion

Instantly switch between PNG, JPEG, WEBP, and AVIF formats to fit any design or development need.

3. Batch Processing

Process multiple images at once to save time and boost productivity.

4. Smart Preview

Real-time previews let you compare and control compression quality effortlessly.

5. Seamless Integration

Works directly within Figma, keeping your design workflow smooth and uninterrupted.

6. Lightweight & Stable

Runs efficiently without slowing down Figma, ensuring a seamless experience.


Thank you for your support

@Wiley Shaw @v-huanghaolan
plugins.tagline: Export PNG, JPEG, WEBP, AVIF,

plugins.name: Link Spacing & Radius Variables (Alpha)
plugins.description:
One-click application of variables to selected objects


Important: Variable Requirements

1. Variables must be in an external library (local variables are not supported yet)

2. The library must be connected to your file


Variable Naming Requirements:

For Spacing:

- Format: `space-{number}`

- Examples: `space-4`, `space-8`, `space-16`, `space-24`

- Variable value must match the number in the name

For Radius:

- Format: `radius-{number}`

- Examples: `radius-4`, `radius-8`, `radius-16`

- Variable value must match the number in the name


Collection Requirements:

- Spacing collection must include the word "spacing" in its name

- Radius collection must include the word "radius" or "border-radius" in its name


How to Prepare Your File

1. Connect the variable library:

- Open "Team Library" menu

- Find the required library

- Enable the toggle next to the "Variables" section

2. Ensure objects are prepared:

- For spacing: objects must use Auto Layout

- For radius: objects must support the cornerRadius property


How to Use

1. Select objects you want to apply variables to

2. Launch the plugin

3. Choose the desired collection from the dropdown (marked with 📚 icon)

4. Click "Apply spacing" or "Apply radius"
plugins.tagline: Link spacing and radius variables

plugins.name: Structura – Effortless Page Organization
plugins.description:
Effortlessly organize and standardize your Figma files with reusable page templates.


Structura helps teams and designers maintain consistency across projects by enabling the creation, saving, and application of structured page layouts. Whether you prefer using built-in presets or custom templates, Structura simplifies your workflow, ensuring every file is clear and organized.



✨ Key Features


  1. Create & Save Custom Templates – Design your own page structures and reuse them effortlessly.
  2. Use Ready-Made Presets – Get started instantly with professionally designed page layouts.
  3. One-Click Template Application – Quickly apply a structure to any Figma file.
  4. Consistent File Organization – Standardize file layouts for better team collaboration.
  5. Easy Editing & Updating – Modify and update templates as your workflow evolves.



🚀 How to Use


  1. Choose a Template – Select from built-in presets or create your own.
  2. Apply to Your File – Instantly structure your Figma pages with one click.
  3. Customize as Needed – Edit sections or save new layouts for future use.
  4. Stay Organized – Ensure every file follows a consistent and streamlined structure.
plugins.tagline: Effortlessly organize and standardize your Figma files with reusable page templates.

plugins.name: Type Rhythm
plugins.description:
A simple plugin for efficiently adjusting typography in Figma. You can increase or decrease font size in 8px increments, and adjust line height in 10% increments. It also allows you to convert Auto line height to 150%. Using tools like Keyboard Maestro to set up shortcuts can enhance your workflow.


Figmaでの文字調整を効率的に行うためのシンプルなプラグインです。フォントサイズを8px単位で増減でき、行間を10%単位で調整可能です。Keyboard Maestroなどのツールを使用してショートカットを設定することで、ワークフローをさらに効率化できます。
plugins.tagline: You can increase or decrease font size in 8px increments.

plugins.name: FontFig
plugins.description:
🤔 How it works:


  1. 1. Choose a font. This will be your base font - it can either be a font you want to manipulate or just help you get a good foundation for the different characters
  2. 2. Import the font. Fontfig will generate an artboard for every character and convert every character into an SVG.
  3. 3. Get creative. Manipulate or create totally new characters.
  4. 4. Export your new font (Whoop)


👉 Pointers:


  1. 📄 One Font can be created / edited per page
  2. 💾 Export each font up to 5 times for one price.
  3. 📐 Adjust the width of the artboard to change letter spacing for each character
  4. 💪 Support for more complex fonts coming soon


💬 We need your feedback:


  1. Drop us a comment or message if you see anything you think could be better. We want to continually improve this Plugin so your feedback is super helpful!
plugins.tagline: Create your own fonts in Figma

plugins.name: Jexity Tokens Exporter
plugins.description:
Jexity Tokens Exporter ables you to export variable collections and gradient styles into TailwindCSS configuration. This is to be used for TailwindCSS plugin.


For now, this can only be used for number and color variable types and for gradient styles. The plugin follows a specific structure and naming conventions, all of which are documented in the README.md file.
plugins.tagline: This ables you to export variable collections and gradient styles into TailwindCSS configuration.

plugins.name: bb-extract
plugins.description: With our Figma plugin, easily export design tokens to JSON format and gain the added advantage of live values! The plugin extends the 'import & export variables' example, streamlining the process by excluding imports and introducing a 'calculatedValue' property with actual color values (e.g., #00F instead of {colors.blue}). Now, you can seamlessly integrate design tokens directly into your codebase, making it a breeze to maintain a consistent design system. Simplify your design workflow and boost collaboration with this powerful plugin today!
plugins.tagline: Enhance your design token workflow with live values! 💫

93017.name: bb-extract
93017.description: With our Figma plugin, easily export design tokens to JSON format and gain the added advantage of live values! The plugin extends the 'import & export variables' example, streamlining the process by excluding imports and introducing a 'calculatedValue' property with actual color values (e.g., #00F instead of {colors.blue}). Now, you can seamlessly integrate design tokens directly into your codebase, making it a breeze to maintain a consistent design system. Simplify your design workflow and boost collaboration with this powerful plugin today!
93017.release_notes: Introduced a recursive check for local variables that reference other local variables, ensuring accurate calculation of values. This update resolves issues in previous versions where the target variable was located within a group inside a collection.
93017.tagline: Enhance your design token workflow with live values! 💫

plugins.name: Style Base
plugins.description:
Stylebase – The Ultimate Design Token Generator for Figma


Stylebase is your all-in-one Figma plugin to supercharge your design workflow. Instantly generate and customize color styles, typography styles, shadow styles, grid systems, and spacing tokens — all from one powerful tool. Whether you're designing a new UI kit or refining an existing design system, Stylebase helps you stay consistent and efficient.


With just one click, you can:

  1. Create all design styles for your project
  2. Generate a fully documented style guide for easy handoff and team alignment


Built for designers, by designers — Stylebase gives you full control and flexibility with customizable presets, responsive token scaling, and seamless integration into any design system.


🎨 Say goodbye to manual setup.

⚡ Say hello to pixel-perfect consistency.


Perfect for: UX/UI Designers, Design System Creators, Product Teams, and Freelancers.

accepted.name: Siddhant giri
accepted.description: Product Designer and a Frontend Developer from India.

plugins.tagline: Style & Document your Design System Faster!

plugins.name: Lumos Design Toolkit
plugins.description:
Lumos Design Toolkit is a powerful Figma plugin that streamlines your design workflow by providing essential tools for managing design systems, variables, text styles, and file organization. It helps designers maintain consistency, save time, and improve collaboration across design projects.


✨ Key Features


🎨 Variables Management

•Import from JSON – Bring your design tokens into Figma with just a few clicks

•Light & Dark Mode Support – Import variables for multiple modes effortlessly

•Smart Conflict Handling – Choose to overwrite, skip, or rename existing variables

•Organize with Collections – Group and manage your variables into clean collections


📝 Text Styles

•Create Custom Styles – Define fonts, sizes, weights, and line heights that match your system

•Apply in One Click – Select a text layer and apply styles instantly

•Live Preview – See exactly how your styles will look before creating

•Full Style Control – View, apply, or delete styles from a single interface


📄 Page Management

•Quick Page Creation – Add new pages without the manual setup

•Batch Mode – Create multiple pages at once by listing names line-by-line

•Organize with Ease – Rename, reorder, and delete pages from one place


🚀 Starter Templates

•Working File Structure – Automatically generate pages like Cover, Research, Drafts, and Final Designs

•Design System Setup – Instantly build a system with pages for Typography, Colors, Components, Layouts, Templates, and Docs
plugins.tagline: Lumos Design Toolkit is a powerful Figma plugin

126376.description:

126376.release_notes:

You can now choose a style folder and set a custom name when creating text styles—making it easier to stay organized and consistent in your files.
•Bug Fixes & Improvements
We cleaned up a few bugs and made some small improvements to keep things running smoothly.
126376.tagline: Lumos Design Toolkit is a powerful Figma plugin

plugins.name: Import AppStore Screenshots
plugins.description:
Screens.farm


How to import iOS screenshots into Figma

  1. In figma, open the plugin menu and launch "Appstore Screenshots"
  2. Enter the iOS app name or url
  3. Click Import


✅ Screenshots are added to your canvas, perfectly aligned and ready to use.


---


Why use screens.farm?

  1. Save hours by skipping the download → upload → organize loop
  2. Instantly grab all App Store screenshots in one click
  3. Create moodboards, presentations, or competitor benchmarks effortlessly
  4. Speed up your app store page redesign workflow
  5. Collaborate with teams on real product screenshots, directly in Figma


---


🎁 FREE version includes limited app imports


---


🚀 License


Unlock the full power of **screens.farm** with a PRO license:


  1. Unlimited app imports
  2. Faster imports with priority processing
  3. Import iPhone & iPad screenshots
  4. Premium support


---


Stop wasting time downloading screenshots one by one.

Let screens.farm do the heavy lifting — so you can focus on design.
plugins.tagline: Import ios apps in one click

plugins.name: Zuuvi Export Service
plugins.description:
Zuuvi Export Service is a Figma plugin designed to integrate Figma with Zuuvi’s Studio platform, making it easier and more efficient for designers who work with both tools. The plugin helps reduce the need to manually recreate designs in Studio after first mocking them up in Figma. While built around Figma’s capabilities, the exported result aims to reflect the original design as closely as possible within the constraints of Studio’s features.


Easily export ad creatives from Figma directly into your Zuuvi workspace - ready for production, personalisation, and cross-channel publishing.

Whether you're designing HTML5 banners, social media ads, retail media formats or in-store screens, this plugin helps creative teams move faster and stay in control.


🔧 What You Can Do with the Zuuvi Plugin:

  1. Export static or layered ad designs directly from Figma to Zuuvi
  2. Optimise for use across display, social, retail media, DOOH, video, and more
  3. Support for production-ready HTML5 ad creatives
  4. Maintain template structure and layer control for streamlined animation workflows


🚀 Why Use Zuuvi for Your Ad Production?

Zuuvi is a Creative Performance Platform that empowers marketers and designers to:


  1. Build high-quality, high-performing HTML5 ads at speed
  2. Personalise and localise creatives across channels and markets
  3. Scale ad production without adding design overhead
  4. Centralise all ad formats - from social media creatives to dynamic banners - in one platform


📚 Documentation & Support

Full plugin guide and step-by-step tutorials: https://help.zuuvi.com/en/articles/10774913-how-to-export-from-figma-to-zuuvi-studio


Questions? Reach out anytime via our live chat or care@zuuvi.com


🧩 Requirements

To use this plugin, an active Zuuvi account is required.

Not a user yet? Learn more and book a demo here.


🔒 Data Security

We value your creative integrity and your data privacy. Zuuvi follows best practices for security, and all plugin exports are processed securely through your Zuuvi account.


Design in Figma. Scale in Zuuvi.

From idea to high-performing ad campaign – Zuuvi makes creative production fast, scalable, and impactful.
plugins.tagline: Convert your Figma designs to omnichannel ad campaigns

plugins.name: 切图尺寸整合 Image Size Integration
plugins.description:
介绍

切图尺寸整合插件让 Figma 用户能够高效地管理和整合图像，适用于框架、组、组件等设计元素。通过该插件，您可以调整图像大小，并应用统一的尺寸以确保设计的一致性。


功能说明

  1. 允许用户选择多个元素（框架、组、组件、文本、实例等）。
  2. 自动计算所选元素的最大宽度和最大高度。
  3. 在预览框内显示每个选定的图像，用户可以选择保持原始尺寸或根据最长边进行缩放。
  4. 开关功能：切换保持图像原始尺寸或根据预览框大小调整图像。
  5. 提供灵活的控制选项，用于调整图像在预览框中的显示方式。


使用方法

  1. 选择您想要预览和调整的元素（框架、组、文本、组件、实例等）。
  2. 点击“生成Base64预览图”按钮以生成图像预览。
  3. 使用开关切换，选择是保持图像原始尺寸还是根据预览框尺寸进行缩放。
  4. 在插件界面直接查看调整后的图像及其对应尺寸。


注意事项

  1. 本插件支持栅格图像和矢量元素。
  2. 图像将显示在固定大小的预览框内，缩放设置会根据您的开关选择进行应用。
  3. 插件操作依赖于 Figma 画布上的选中元素，请确保在使用插件前选中正确的元素。


Introduction

Image Size Integration allows Figma users to efficiently manage and integrate images within frames, groups, and components. With this plugin, you can adjust image sizes and apply uniform dimensions for a consistent design output.


Function Description

  1. Allows users to select multiple elements (Frames, Groups, Components, Text, Instances, etc.) in a Figma design.
  2. Automatically calculates the maximum width and height from the selected elements.
  3. Displays each selected image inside a preview box, either maintaining its original size or resizing it based on the longest side, as determined by the user's settings.
  4. A toggle feature to switch between maintaining the image's original size or scaling it to fit the preview box.
  5. Supports flexible control over how images are displayed within their allocated preview space.


How to Use

  1. Select the elements (Frames, Groups, Text, Components, Instances, etc.) you want to preview and adjust.
  2. Click the "Generate Base64 Preview" button to create image previews.
  3. Use the toggle to switch between keeping the image’s original size or scaling it to fit the preview box.
  4. View the adjusted images and their corresponding dimensions directly within the plugin's interface.


Notes

  1. The plugin supports both raster images and vector elements.
  2. Images will be displayed in a fixed-size preview box, and resizing settings apply based on your toggle choice.
  3. The plugin works with selected elements in Figma's canvas, so ensure you have the right items selected before applying the tool.

accepted.name: KingweiCheung
accepted.description: Everything gets a response, but nothing gets a resolution. 事事有回应，事事不答应。

plugins.tagline: Easily integrate and adjust image sizes for frames.

plugins.name: Design Notes
plugins.description:
不用创建组件，快速保存和复用设计资源。

你可以

  1. 保存最近常用的图标、组件、图片等所有设计
  2. 快速创建克隆
  3. 在单独的页面快速备份设计稿，保持页面整洁
  4. 当作有历史记录的剪贴板使用

---

注意：

  1. 本插件仅记录元素的id信息用于检索，不存储实际设计内容
  2. 本地存储，不支持跨设备跨浏览器
  3. 不支持跨文件调用设计内容

---

Quickly save and reuse design resources without creating components.


You can:

  1. Save frequently used icons, components, images, and all design elements.
  2. Quickly create clones.
  3. Backup design drafts on a separate page to keep your workspace organized.
  4. Use it as a clipboard with history.


Note:

  1. This plugin only records the ID information of elements for retrieval and does not store actual design content.
  2. It uses local storage and does not support cross-device or cross-browser functionality.
  3. It also does not support calling design content across different files.

---

contact: Tylergg98@outlook.com
plugins.tagline: Simpy save and re-use your designs without managing components

plugins.name: One Click Export
plugins.description:
📌 ストーリー

フレームを指定してエクスポートをするときに、意図しない下の階層でエクスポートがされて悲しんでいる方々をたくさん見てきました。

そこで！少しでも役に立てればと思いプラグインを作っちゃいました！


このプラグインなら、セクションをクリックするだけで、その直下にあるフレームをボタンひとつで "カンタン" にエクスポートできちゃいます。

これで間違った階層でのエクスポートミスも防げるようになりました！

やったね🙌


📝 使い方

  1. プラグインを起動する
  2. セクションをクリックする
  3. セクション上にあるフレームがリストで表示されるので、順番にエクスポートのボタンをクリックする


⭐️ 今後のアップデート予定

  1. イケてるUIにする
  2. セクション上にあるフレームをまとめてエクスポートできるようにする
plugins.tagline: セクション直下にあるフレームをカンタンにエクスポートできる

plugins.name: E-ImageCompression
plugins.description:
E-ImageCompression is a privacy-focused tool that lets you reduce image sizes by up to 90% without sacrificing quality, seamlessly integrated into your workflow.


Your files are never stored on our servers — images are processed securely via the official TinyPNG API and delivered straight back to you.


Batch compress multiple images, preview results, and export everything with a single click.

Perfect for anyone who values speed, security, and high-quality image optimization.
plugins.tagline: Optimize images in one click

137621.name: E-ImageCompression
137621.description:
E-ImageCompression is a privacy-focused tool that lets you reduce image sizes by up to 90% without sacrificing quality, seamlessly integrated into your workflow.


Your files are never stored on our servers — images are processed securely via the official TinyPNG API and delivered straight back to you.


Batch compress multiple images, preview results, and export everything with a single click.

Perfect for anyone who values speed, security, and high-quality image optimization.

networkAccess.reasoning: The plugin uses TinyPNG API for image compression. Since TinyPNG API doesn't support CORS directly, we use a CORS proxy (cors.siteceterum.ru) for secure API communication.

plugins.name: Padding Check
plugins.description: Are developers always at your back since your paddings are always not multiples of 4? This plugin solves this problem of yours where you can quickly identify the Figma frames with the said padding issues. The plugin has a very simple UI where we have info display section and 2 buttons. 1st button "Highlight frames" selects all problematic frames and brings them to your view (Shift+1) and the 2nd button "Mark frames" creates a red box around all the frames that have a padding issue. The good news is that this plugin works only for Auto layout frames and not for all frames thereby not giving you unwanted results. As a helper once the plugin is executed (either of the buttons used to find the frames with issues) The information section of the plugin UI displays the count of the frames with issues helping the user to quickly take account of the issue.
plugins.tagline: Are all paddings in your Figma file multiples of 4? Use this plugin to quickly identify if not!

134144.name: Padding Check
134144.description: Are developers always at your back since your paddings are always not multiples of 4? This plugin solves this problem of yours where you can quickly identify the Figma frames with the said padding issues. The plugin has a very simple UI where we have info display section and 2 buttons. 1st button "Highlight frames" selects all problematic frames and brings them to your view (Shift+1) and the 2nd button "Mark frames" creates a red box around all the frames that have a padding issue. The good news is that this plugin works only for Auto layout frames and not for all frames thereby not giving you unwanted results. As a helper once the plugin is executed (either of the buttons used to find the frames with issues) The information section of the plugin UI displays the count of the frames with issues helping the user to quickly take account of the issue.
134144.tagline: Are all paddings in your Figma file multiples of 4? Use this plugin to quickly identify if not!

plugins.name: Magic Renamer AI - With Design Token mode
plugins.description:
Magic Renamer AI is a Figma plugin that lets you automatically rename all your layers in one click (up to 120 layers at once, with design token support).


With AI, it suggests clear and consistent names that follow design and design system best practices.


🔥Key features:


  1. Smart, instant renaming: The AI analyzes your file and suggests relevant names for each layer.
  2. Time-saving: No more manual renaming—everything is done in seconds, even for large files.
  3. Clarity and consistency: Naming conventions are enforced, making teamwork easier.
  4. Simple interface: One-click use, no complicated setup. Advanced options are available if you need them.
  5. Design token support: Perfect for solo or teams using advanced design systems.
  6. Custom API support: Use your own API key (OpenAI, DeepSeek, Perplexity, or OpenRouter) for more control.


💡 Why choose Magic Renamer AI?

Unlike other plugins, Magic Renamer AI uses artificial intelligence to understand the context of each layer and suggest names tailored to your project. It ensures consistency, reduces errors, and fits seamlessly into your Figma workflow. It’s the perfect tool to save time, improve file quality, and speed up your design process.
plugins.tagline: AI-powered batch renaming for Layers — up to 120 at once -> Clarity | Consistency

137619.name: Magic Renamer AI - With Design Token mode
137619.description:
Magic Renamer AI is a Figma plugin that lets you automatically rename all your layers in one click (up to 120 layers at once, with design token support).


With AI, it suggests clear and consistent names that follow design and design system best practices.


🔥Key features:


  1. Smart, instant renaming: The AI analyzes your file and suggests relevant names for each layer.
  2. Time-saving: No more manual renaming—everything is done in seconds, even for large files.
  3. Clarity and consistency: Naming conventions are enforced, making teamwork easier.
  4. Simple interface: One-click use, no complicated setup. Advanced options are available if you need them.
  5. Design token support: Perfect for solo or teams using advanced design systems.
  6. Custom API support: Use your own API key (OpenAI, DeepSeek, Perplexity, or OpenRouter) for more control.


💡 Why choose Magic Renamer AI?

Unlike other plugins, Magic Renamer AI uses artificial intelligence to understand the context of each layer and suggest names tailored to your project. It ensures consistency, reduces errors, and fits seamlessly into your Figma workflow. It’s the perfect tool to save time, improve file quality, and speed up your design process.

137619.tagline: AI-powered batch renaming for Layers — up to 120 at once -> Clarity | Consistency

Generate ready to use table components containing your local variables and styles including their type, collection and values. The component is generated with pre-made variants for types (effects, paints, text, numbers, strings etc.).


Easy to use:

Open the file containing the desired variables and styles

Click on of the 2 Generate buttons. One for variables and the other for styles.

That's it


Bonus: These components can be used in Figma Sites too in cases you want your documentation there


Coming soon:

Modes

plugins.name: Variant Multi-Selector
plugins.description:
Tired of manually selecting variant properties one by one?


Variant Multi-Selector solves this by allowing you to multi-select multiple properties and values together — and instantly filter, edit, and manage matching variants inside your component set! 🚀


✨ Key Features:

•Select multiple properties (like Size, State, Type) at once

•Apply filters and select matching variants instantly

•View bound variables attached to your variants (Figma Variables integration!)

•Designed for fast, large-scale Design System workflows


🔥 Perfect for:

•Design system builders

•Product designers managing large variant sets

•UI/UX designers who want to speed up Figma workflows


🙏 Built with love and real-world design pain.
plugins.tagline: Select and edit multiple variant properties at once.

•Product designers managing large variant sets

•UI/UX designers who want to speed up Figma workflows


🙏 Built with love and real-world design pain.
130411.tagline: Select and edit multiple variant properties at once.

plugins.name: Paste Data
plugins.description:
🧩 Paste CSV into Text Layers

Paste tabular data directly into selected Figma text layers. Supports Excel or CSV data, auto-detects rows or columns, and applies values instantly.


🧠 Smart paste detection: one row = horizontal; multiple rows = vertical

💡 Works with grouped/frames/nested selections

⚡ Designed for quick content updates and data-driven designs

plugins.name: Frame Size Manager
plugins.description: A Figma plugin that lets you create, save, and apply custom size presets and naming conventions to your design elements. Quickly resize frames, components, and other objects while automatically applying consistent naming patterns with prefixes and suffixes. Perfect for design systems and teams that need to maintain consistent dimensions and naming across projects.
plugins.tagline: Streamline your Figma workflow with quick access to size presets and naming conventions.

plugins.name: FigCrawl
plugins.description:
FigCrawl: Your FigJam Content Extractor


What is FigCrawl?

FigCrawl is a powerful FigJam plugin that transforms your collaborative boards into structured, AI-ready data. It intelligently extracts and organizes all your board's content while preserving the visual hierarchy and relationships between elements.


Use Cases

For Designers & Teams

  1. Extract structured content from brainstorming sessions
  2. Convert visual collaboration into actionable data
  3. Document and archive board content
  4. Share board content in a structured format


For AI/LLM Integration

  1. Feed board content into AI tools
  2. Generate summaries and reports
  3. Analyze relationships between ideas
  4. Create structured documentation


For Documentation

  1. Export board content for documentation
  2. Create structured reports
  3. Archive important board sessions
  4. Share insights with stakeholders



How It Works

  1. Launch: Open the plugin in your FigJam board
  2. Extract: Click "Extract Content" to scan your board
  3. Review: See a summary of extracted content
  4. Copy: Choose to copy the entire board or individual pages
  5. Use: Paste the JSON into your preferred AI tool or LLM
plugins.tagline: Extract FigJam content into AI-ready data with one click

126334.description:

plugins.name: OS converter
plugins.description:
Stop duplicating your work! Convert entire flows or single frames between iOS and Android in seconds — no more tedious manual adjustments.


Why OS Converter?

Designers are often faced with a choice:

  1. Design in one OS and leave conversions to developers
  2. Manually recreate each flow for both platforms


With OS Converter, you get the best of both worlds — fast, accurate, and hassle-free conversion.


How it works:

  1. Set up your components – Use a variant property named "OS" with values "iOS" and "Android"
  2. Run the plugin – When your layouts are ready to convert
  3. Click to swap! – Convert single frames or entire flows in one click
  4. 🎨 See it in action! Check out the sample file below.
plugins.tagline: Swap single frames or entire flows between iOS and Android in seconds!
